meanings.definition: A piece of furniture for sleeping on.
meanings.sent1: I love to read in my cozy bed before falling asleep.
meanings.sent2: The cat curled up on the bed and purred contentedly.
meanings.sent3: The bed seemed to be calling my name after a long day at work.
meanings.sent4: Sleep is like a warm embrace from a familiar bed.
meanings.sent5: The bed felt like a cloud, gently carrying me to dreamland.

meanings.definition: The bottom of a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The divers explored the ocean bed to find hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The shipwreck rested peacefully on the ocean bed.
meanings.sent3: The fish swam above the colorful bed of the sea.
meanings.sent4: The ocean bed held secrets waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The ocean bed was a mysterious world teeming with life.

meanings.definition: A layer of rock or sediment.
meanings.sent1: The geologists studied the rock bed to understand the Earth's history.
meanings.sent2: The river carved through the sediment bed over centuries.
meanings.sent3: The layers of the rock bed revealed ancient fossils.
meanings.sent4: Time is etched in the stone bed, telling stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The sediment bed held clues to the planet's evolution.
